description: This file defines authentication-related API endpoints for registration, login, and fetching current user details in a FastAPI application. It includes route handlers, dependency injection, and response models.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Database model representing a user, including fields like email, username, password_hash, etc.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: Schema model for login request data, including email and password.

classes.name: Token
classes.description: Schema model for JWT token response, including access_token and token_type.

classes.name: UserPublic
classes.description: Schema model exposing non-sensitive user info for public responses.

methods.name: register_user(email: EmailStr, password: str, username: str | None = None, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles user registration by verifying email uniqueness, creating a new user, and returning public user info.

methods.name: login(data: LoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Authenticates user credentials and returns a JWT access token if successful.

methods.name: read_users_me(current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user))
methods.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's public details.

ctags.name: register_user
ctags.pattern: /^def register_user(email: EmailStr, password: str, username: str | None = None, db: Session = Dep/
ctags.signature: (email: EmailStr, password: str, username: str | None = None, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
